sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Single = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({ image: "", name: "", price: "", desc: "" }); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { loadProduct(); }, []); const loadProduct = async () => { const result = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8888/products/${id}`); setProduct(result.data) } return (

{product.name}

Availability: In stock

{product.price}

Quick Overview:

{product.desc}

    Length

  • 32
  • 34
    Quantity:
Buy

Popular Products Now

{product.map(({ id, image, name, price }, index) => (

{name}

  • {price}

  • GET IT
))}
) } Single.propTypes = { products: PropTypes.array } export default Single
